edits.oldString:
DeepL Clone

Powered by Alibaba Cloud Qwen
edits.newString:
Translator

Fast, accurate translations powered by Qwen MT-Turbo

edits.oldString:
{/* Language Selection */}
          <div className="flex items-center justify-between mb-4">
edits.newString:
{/* Language Selection */}
          <div className="flex items-center justify-between mb-6">

<SelectTrigger className="w-52 h-12 text-base border-2 border-gray-200 hover:border-blue-400 focus:border-blue-500">
                  <SelectValue />
                </SelectTrigger>

<SelectTrigger className="w-52 h-12 text-base border-2 border-gray-200 hover:border-blue-400 focus:border-blue-500">
                  <SelectValue />
                </SelectTrigger>

edits.oldString:
<Button
                variant="ghost"
                size="sm"
                onClick={swapLanguages}
                disabled={sourceLang === "auto"}
                className="p-2"
              >
                <ArrowUpDown className="h-4 w-4" />
edits.newString:
<Button
                variant="ghost"
                size="lg"
                onClick={swapLanguages}
                disabled={sourceLang === "auto"}
                className="p-3 hover:bg-blue-50 hover:text-blue-600 transition-colors"
              >
                <ArrowUpDown className="h-5 w-5" />

edits.oldString:
<Button variant="ghost" size="sm" onClick={clearText}>
              <RotateCcw className="h-4 w-4 mr-2" />
              Clear
            </Button>
edits.newString:
<Button variant="ghost" size="lg" onClick={clearText} className="hover:bg-red-50 hover:text-red-600 transition-colors">
              <RotateCcw className="h-5 w-5 mr-2" />
              Clear
            </Button>

edits.oldString:
{/* Translation Interface */}
          <div className="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
edits.newString:
{/* Translation Interface */}
          <div className="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-6">

edits.oldString:
<Textarea
                placeholder="Enter text to translate..."
                value={sourceText}
                onChange={(e) => handleSourceTextChange(e.target.value)}
                className="min-h-[200px] resize-none border-gray-300 focus:border-blue-500"
              />
edits.newString:
<Textarea
                placeholder="Enter text to translate..."
                value={sourceText}
                onChange={(e) => handleSourceTextChange(e.target.value)}
                className="min-h-[250px] text-base resize-none border-2 border-gray-200 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-200 transition-all"
              />

edits.oldString:
<Textarea
                placeholder={isTranslating ? "Translating..." : "Translation will appear here..."}
                value={translatedText}
                readOnly
                className="min-h-[200px] resize-none border-gray-300 bg-gray-50"
              />
edits.newString:
<Textarea
                placeholder={isTranslating ? "Translating..." : "Translation will appear here..."}
                value={translatedText}
                readOnly
                className="min-h-[250px] text-base resize-none border-2 border-gray-200 bg-gradient-to-br from-gray-50 to-blue-50"
              />

edits.oldString:
<Button
                  variant="ghost"
                  size="sm"
                  onClick={() => copyToClipboard(sourceText)}
                  disabled={!sourceText}
                >
                  <Copy className="h-4 w-4" />
                </Button>
edits.newString:
<Button
                  variant="ghost"
                  size="sm"
                  onClick={() => copyToClipboard(sourceText)}
                  disabled={!sourceText}
                  className="hover:bg-blue-50 hover:text-blue-600 transition-colors"
                >
                  <Copy className="h-4 w-4" />
                </Button>

edits.oldString:
<Button
                  variant="ghost"
                  size="sm"
                  onClick={() => copyToClipboard(translatedText)}
                  disabled={!translatedText}
                >
                  <Copy className="h-4 w-4" />
                </Button>
edits.newString:
<Button
                  variant="ghost"
                  size="sm"
                  onClick={() => copyToClipboard(translatedText)}
                  disabled={!translatedText}
                  className="hover:bg-green-50 hover:text-green-600 transition-colors"
                >
                  <Copy className="h-4 w-4" />
                </Button>
